	\title{Supplementary Material to \\
		``First-principles study on the electronic structure of Pb$_{10-x}$Cu$_x$(PO$_4$)$_6$O ($x$=0, 1)"}

%\Caption{The Pbe+$U$ Predicted Lattice Parameters $A$ And $C$ (In $\Aa$), Volume (In $\Aa^3$), And Band Gap (In Ev)

%The Adopted Effective Hubbard $U$ Parameters Were Taken From L. Wang, T. Maxisch, And G. Ceder, Phys. Rev. B 73, 195107 (2006).
%Namely, $U$(Cu)=4 Ev, $U$(Ni)=5.1 Ev, $U$(Zn)=7.5 Ev,  $U$(Ag)=5.8 Ev,  And $U$(Au)=4.0 Ev.
%}
